Token.Abstract: Utility class for data encryption operations.

Returns a unique identifier associated with this app install. The identifier will remain the same for the lifetime of the app's installation on the device. If the app is uninstalled, a new identifier will be created if it is ever reinstalled.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A unique identifier for the app install on the particular device.

Token.Abstract: Whether or not the base app identifier has been configured for this app install.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the base app ID has already been configured, NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Whether or not the base app identifier was configured at some point during this launch of the app.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the base app ID was configured during this app launch; NO otherwise.
